pages.title: Crystal Dagger
pages.text: Crystal dagger is a precious sacrificial dagger,made from gold,diamond and obscure magical crystal.Monsters,killed by this dagger, have chance of dropping special loot.Sheep gives stomach with 10% chance, wither skeleton-25% chance of wither fork bone,creeper-25% chance of creeper skin,witch-gives witch hair.Also used to get human blood.
